name: Unreal abductions
description:
Description:

Unreal abductions is a simplistic alien abduction sim where you have to abduct as many people as you can. But watch out, There will be people trying to shoot you down. this game was created for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

The game can be played in the browser, but I've also included a pc download.

Controls:

Use wasd to move around and space to toggle your tractor beam.
you can pause with the escape key.

Note:

This is my first ever game and game jam, so keep in mind that the game might be a bit rough around the edges. I tried to keep things very minimal in order to finish it in time.

other than that, have fun! :D
